review: great demo version of the game arpg with a nice story and interface it has a steep learning curve but i got over it and bought the game because of the demo the best sales tool ever  if the game has value ans appeal

a seriously cool game so worth the money and so glad i purchased it nice graphics fun characters amusing dialogue and lots of action my best buy of 2016 how did this gem manage to stay hidden for so long i only found it by chance on youtube while searching on google for games similar to diablo needless to say ill be buying all the other van helsings now
the demo was fun and ill probably buy the game when it is on sale what can i say im cheap  try the demo  if you dont like it all you did was waste some time instead of money
